name: Moore
title: Moore cluster data package 2023-10-30 release candidate
description: Data package for the Moore cluster

contributors.title: Anna Cresswell
contributors.description: Updated spatial data (reduced number of sites, updated k and site areas).

contributors.title: Takuya Iwanaga
contributors.description: Packaged data and generated downscaled initial coral covers using data from the ReefModEngine.

contributors.title: Pedro Ribeiro de Almeida
contributors.description: Added coral mortality projections due to cyclone.

resources.name: connectivity
resources.description: Connectivity data for specific days across years, grouped by year

resources.name: cyclone_mortality
resources.description: Coral mortality projections due to cyclone.

resources.name: spatial_data
resources.description: spatial data of cluster. Unique sites indicated by reef_siteid. Zone types under zone_type.

resources.name: coral_cover
description:
Initial coral cover is downscaled from ReefModEngine data (v1.0.18 / rme_ml_2023_03_30b).
RME data loaded by ADRIA distributes cover over size classes weighted by the PDF densities of ReefMod's size distribution (log-normal with mean log(700cm^2) and std log(4cm^2)).
The result is distributed over sites according to the indicated available k area for each site.

resources.name: DHWs
resources.description: Stochastic degree heating week data for the Moore Cluster. Includes data for RCPs 2.6, 4.5, 6.0, 8.5

resources.name: waves
resources.description: Stochastic wave data for the Moore cluster. Empty datasets for RCPs 2.6, 4.5, 6.0, 8.5
